channel.title: Screw my school... We need stuff about Einstine's theory of relitivity
channel.description: OK now I helped u now u help me. I don't know shit bout him and his theorys so plz help. Dont pay attention :P lol

item.title: Screw my school... We need stuff about Einstine's theory of relitivity
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

[quote=“oddinn686, post:4, topic:13494”]OK, it’s been a while since I’ve done this, but here goes:
Special Relativity is the concept that there is not absolute space and time (as proposed by Newton) but instead, that time and space are linked together and related to the person observing them. Also is the basis for the equation E=mc^2.

General Relativity is the concept that gravity is not a force, but the representation of the distortion of space-time. This again, overthrew one of Newton’s earlier concepts.

If you want more than that, you’re going to have to look it up.[/quote] holy crap… english plz lol

Read full topic

item.title: Screw my school... We need stuff about Einstine's theory of relitivity
item.dc:creator: @oddinn686 oddinn686
item.description:
@oddinn686 wrote:

OK, it’s been a while since I’ve done this, but here goes:
Special Relativity is the concept that there is not absolute space and time (as proposed by Newton) but instead, that time and space are linked together and related to the person observing them. Also is the basis for the equation E=mc^2.

General Relativity is the concept that gravity is not a force, but the representation of the distortion of space-time. This again, overthrew one of Newton’s earlier concepts.

If you want more than that, you’re going to have to look it up.

Read full topic
